mapper.insert: insert into IM_D_SUBMISSIONS (ID, RECEIVE_TASK_ID,RECEIVE_BOOK, FILE_ADDRESS,STATUS,MESSAGE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receiveTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receiveBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fileAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})

ID,
RECEIVE_TASK_ID,

mapper.update:
update IM_D_SUBMISSIONS
RECEIVE_TASK_ID = #{receiveTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RECEIVE_BOOK=#{receiveBook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_ADDRESS = #{fileAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE=#{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from IM_D_SUBMISSIONS where RECEIVE_TASK_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from IM_D_SUBMISSIONS where RECEIVE_TASK_ID = #{receiveId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by UPDATE_TIME desc limit 1
